Calm Emotions Information

Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Duration: 10 turns Range: 18m Radius: 6m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Calm Emotions

Calm Emotions can be acquired by the following classes:

Bard Cleric Archfey (Warlock Subclass)
